name: One Hit KO DEMO
description:
This is a DEMO for a game called One Hit KO.

The game is currently on Steam Greenlight, if you want it to be released vote here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=779726691

Or paste this on your browser to open the Steam Desktop Client (so you don´t have to manually login): steam://url/CommunityFilePage/779726691
